text: The World Influencers and Bloggers Awards, or WIBA Awards, is an international award founded by Mariia Grazhina Chaplin. The first ceremony was held on May 24, 2019. == Winners == WIBA Awards title holders are the top world influencers and prominent personalities: Year Name Nomination Country 2019 Gianluca Vacchi King of Instagram – Grand Prix Italy 2019 Nusret Gökçe Best Celebrity Influencer Turkiye 2019 Foodgod Best Food Influencer United States 2019 Bhuvan Bam Best Entertainment Influencer India 2019 Victoria Silvstedt Best Glamour Influencer Monaco 2019 Greta Thunberg Best Sustainable Influencer Sweden 2019 Anna Andres Best Fashion Business Influencer France 2019 Zaklina Berrido Pisano Best Style Influencer Italy 2019 Alice Abdelaziz Best Sisterhood Lebanon 2019 Farah Abdelaziz Best Sisterhood Lebanon 2019 Nadine Abdelaziz Best Sisterhood Lebanon 2019 Sharon Fonseca Best Model Influencer Italy
